body.name: Amazon Basics In Ear Wired Headphones, Earbuds with Microphone No Wireless Technology, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: Earbud headphones with in-ear fit and wired design (not wireless)
Built-in microphone with controller (answer or hang up calls; pause or skip tracks)
Compatible with any device with a 3.5mm jack, including Android and IOS smartphones; devices without a 3.5mm jack, like the iPhone 7, 8, 10, and Pixel 2, require an adapter
Upgraded internal circuit addresses durability issues in previous version
Product Dimensions: 0.96 x 0.56 x 0.64 inches (LxWxH) with a 3.9-foot cable

Note: If the size of the earbud tips does not match the size of your ear canals or the headset is not worn properly in your ears, you may not obtain the correct sound qualities or call performance. Change the earbud tips to ones that fit more snugly in your ear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is really great. High quality sound, buds are soft, they don't create ear pain, good price. Arrived on time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, reasonable head phones.
reviews.reviewText: Does the job at good price. Stero sound and stays in your ears.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for phone conversations or listening to music while still or easy walking.
reviews.reviewText: These headphones work well for the price. I enjoy the sound quality for music and conversations. It's clear without distortion and people on the other end of the phone have no issues with hearing me as well. They work well for sitting still or walking around.Their downfall is they let wind noise distort the sound if it's blowing, or I am riding my bike with them. They don't work well for that at all. The wind volume increases and sound volume decreases.The silicone earbuds covers fit fair, they are oblong the way they're mounted and don't really seal as well as if they were rounded. For the price and for basic listening and calling they do well enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I sit at a desk all day and while I use my air pods for my phone I also use wired ear phones for what I need to listen to on my desk top computer. I decided to order a pair of the amazon ones mainly because they were cheap and I am on a budget. I was so surprised when I got them because they looked nice and they fit my ears great but the real test would be when I plugged them in. TO MY SURPRISE the sound quality was GREAT! I am SUPER HAPPY with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item for the 2nd time, because I was extremely happy and satisfied with my first purchase. I thought that the only difference would be the color, as the red ones were no longer available. Sadly, the sound quality of this second purchase is decidedly inferior; music sounds tinnish, with almost no base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and affordable
reviews.reviewText: SOOOOOO simple and still not broken! I have many children and they always grab and use and then eventually break my headphones! So far they have handled this one and it still works like a charm! The string is very strong and the headphones itself it very well and simply made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Solid Sound for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I recently snagged a pair of Amazon Basics In-Ear Wired Headphones on a whim, and let me tell you, I'm impressed by its price and quality. Now, I'm no audiophile, but for the price tag, these little earbuds deliver punchy sound, decent noise cancellation, and a comfortable fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the cost
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, when I bought these I wasn't expecting much. I just needed a pair for a brief period of time while I worked on getting a genuine headset. But I've had these things for about a year now and I'm happy (and mostly surprised) to say that they still work.I'm no audio connoisseur or anything- but based on my knowledge of having had a great many wired earbuds over the span of my life, I can say that these are actually pretty decent. The sound quality is good and has remained such. The microphone quality is not the greatest but you'll definitely be audible (and it has also continued to work). And most important of all in my opinion; the earbud jack, and the part of the cable that connects to the earbud/mic itself, has remained strong and intact.Which, if you've ever had earbuds, chances are you know the feeling of having to practically crack the DaVinci Code moving the wire every time you want to get audio in both ears.But with these, I've never had that problem in the entirety of owning them.So TDLR: if you're looking for pretty cheap headphones, want them to last a long time, and don't really care about audio quality either way; these are a great pair to purchase.But also a bit of a heads-up; the wire itself is a bit flimsy, so do be careful with it. Otherwise you should be good!EDIT: Just my luck, a few weeks after I wrote this review, the headphones finally gave out. Left side only works if I hold the wire at a very specific angle, and right side gave out completely. Overall though, they lasted a little over a year total (with my heavy use and terrible treatment of the things), so really still worth getting if you need a decent pair of earbuds for a low cost.
Great sound quality, especially considering the low price. Comes with tips in three different sizes, so you can find one that fits for you. Would buy again.
Son buenos para el día a día, no esperen mucho de ellos obtienes lo que pagas.

Ho acquistato queste cuffie data la necessità per il loro prezzo economico.-Packaging:La confezione è di cartone, all'interno troviamo:Le cuffie, insieme a una bustina trasparente in cui vi sono 4 gommini di ricambio con diversa grandezza.-Caratteristiche:Comodo design in-earMicrofono integrato con pulsante di comandoCollegamento a ingresso jack da 3,5 mm (o tramite adattatore) sia per Android o iOSLunghezza del cavo: 1,18 cm-ProPrezzo economico.Gommini adattabili alle proprie orecchie.Qualità audio buona.Microfono con pulsante di comando (tramite cui è possibile stoppare la musica, rispondere e terminare la chiamata, attivare il riconoscimento vocale).Cavo morbido di buona qualità.Prezzo economico.ControIl cavo di 1,18 cm può risultare fastidioso per la sua lunghezza.Scarsa cancellazione del rumore esternoScarsa potenza dei bassi.Il prodotto è molto conveniente, ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Le cuffie sono buone : buona qualità, suono buono ed ergonomiche (si adattano perfettamente alle orecchie).
Bestellung und Lieferung hat gut geklappt (wenn ich auch ein wenig habe drauf warten müssen, aber ich hatte es auch nicht eilig) und mit der Qualität bin ich auch zufrieden.
Für den Preis die besten In-Ohr-Kopfhörer, die ich kenne. Sogar ein zweites Paar für meinen Mann bestellt. Endlich Kopfhörer die im Ohr bleiben und die nicht drücken.
